meanings.sent1: The manifesters of the plan worked hard to make it a reality.
meanings.sent2: The manifesters of the art exhibition were praised for their creativity.
meanings.sent3: The manifesters of the surprise party hid in the dark to avoid being seen.
meanings.sent4: The manifesters of change are like artists painting a new picture of the future.
meanings.sent5: The manifesters of dreams have the power to turn imagination into truth.

meanings.definition: Those who bring about or make evident.
meanings.sent1: The manifesters of justice fought for equality in the community.
meanings.sent2: The manifesters of happiness spread joy wherever they go.
meanings.sent3: The manifesters of chaos accidentally spilled glitter all over the room.
meanings.sent4: The manifesters of truth shine a light on the darkest secrets.
meanings.sent5: The manifesters of hope illuminate the path to a better tomorrow.
